column4: News;On 7 September 2018 Cambodian star rapper MC Bull had his Camry stolen. Fortunately for the hip-hopper
column5: his wheels were later found on a plot of land in Chambak village in Kampong Speu province.------Before the incident the MC had parked his whip outside his crib in Chamkarmon.------The ride was seen to be missing by MC Bull’s sister who woke him up. Using the GPS signal on his phone
column7: and recovered it with help from local police.------No suspects have been arrested.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/258524
